00231         public String call(String message) throws Exception {
00232                 String response = null;
00233                 String corrId = java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString();
00234                 BasicProperties props = new BasicProperties.Builder()
00235                                 .correlationId(corrId).replyTo(replyQueueName).build();
00236 
00237                 channel.basicPublish("", requestQueueName, props, message.getBytes());
00238                 int timeout_ms = 30000;
00239 
00240                 while (true) {
00241 
00242                         QueueingConsumer.Delivery delivery = consumer
00243                                         .nextDelivery(timeout_ms);
00244                         if (delivery == null) {
00245                                 if (channel.isOpen() == false) // Seems to always return true
00246                                 {
00247 
00248                                         System.out.println("Channel is not open");
00249                                 }
00250                         } else {
00251 
00252                                 // ... Process message - delivery.getBody()
00253                                 if (delivery.getProperties().getCorrelationId().equals(corrId)) {
00254                                         response = new String(delivery.getBody());
00255                                         break;
00256                                 }
00257                         }
00258                 }
00259 
00260                 return response;
00261                 // return "response";
00262         }
00263

00302         private void OpenScreenDialog() {
00303                 screenDialog = new AlertDialog.Builder(this);
00304                 screenDialog.setTitle("Finding Places");
00305                 TextView TextOut = new TextView(MainActivity.this);
00306                 TextOut.setBackgroundColor(Color.WHITE);

00309                                 LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT, LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);
00310                 TextOut.setLayoutParams(textOutLayoutParams);
00311 
00312                 RelativeLayout dialogLayout = new RelativeLayout(this);
00313                 dialogLayout.addView(TextOut);
00314                 screenDialog.setView(dialogLayout);
00315 
00316                 screenDialog.setPositiveButton("OK",
00317                                 new DialogInterface.OnClickListener() {
00318                                         // do something when the button is clicked
